Source code for catplat.tests.test_core

""" Test for catplat.core module. """

import pytest

from catplat.core.chemsys import Chemsys




[docs]
class TestChemsys(object):
    """ Test for catplat.core.chemsys """



[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('value,sort', (('Cu', 'Cu'),
                                            ('Cu-Al', 'Al-Cu'),
                                            ('Al-Cu-Pt', 'Al-Cu-Pt'),
                                            ('Cu-*-Al', '*-Al-Cu'),
                                            ('Cu-[Al,Pt]', 'Cu-[Al,Pt]')))
    def test_valid_value(self, value, sort):
        chemsys = Chemsys(value)
        assert chemsys._value == value
        assert chemsys == sort





[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('value', ('CuAl', 'non-element', 'Cu-[non-element]'))
    def test_bad_value(self, value):
        with pytest.raises(ValueError) as e:
            Chemsys(value)





[docs]
    def test_expand(self):
        """ Test expansion of nested chemsys. """
        chemsys = Chemsys('Cu-[Al,Pt]')
        assert chemsys.expand() == ['Al-Cu', 'Cu-Pt']





[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('value,expected', (('Cu', 1),
                                                ('Cu-*', 2),
                                                ('Cu-[Al,Pt]', 4),
                                                ('Cu-[Al,Pt]-[Pd,Rh,Ni]', 36)))
    def test_expanded_query(self, value, expected):
        """ Test product of all element positions of the expanded list. """
        chemsys = Chemsys(value)
        assert len(chemsys.expanded_query()) == expected





[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('value,expected', (('Cu', False),
                                                ('Cu-*', True),
                                                ('Al-Cu', False),
                                                ('Cu-[Al,Pt]', True)))
    def test_contain_wildcard(self, value, expected):
        chemsys = Chemsys(value)
        assert chemsys.contain_wildcards == expected





[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('value,true,false', (('Cu-*', 'Al-Cu', 'Al-Pt'),
                                                  ('Cu-Al', 'Al-Cu', 'Al-Pt'),
                                                  ('Cu-[Al,Pt]', 'Al-Cu', 'Cu-Ni')))
    def test_match(self, value, true, false):
        chemsys = Chemsys(value)
        assert chemsys.match(true) is True
        assert chemsys.match(false) is False
